Pre-Game Insights: Canada will enjoy playing in the tournament’s opening match against Argentina on June 20 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta.
Jesse Marsch takes over from Mauro Biello as the new head coach of Canada just five weeks before the start of the tournament.
Alphonso Davies has won all three matches he has played against Lionel Messi, and he aims to extend his winning streak to 4 out of 4 against Argentina.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The only debutant in this tournament is Canada.
Canada’s star, Alphonso Davies, has won all three matches he has played against Lionel Messi.
